name: Successful creation of a user in petStore

testSteps.description:
Given A user send the request to create a new user in the endpoint "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user"
| id | 13 |
| username | fmolina |
| firstName | felipe |
| lastName | molina |
| email | pipemoli9611@gmail.com |
| password | 12345678 |
| phone | 3165188144 |
| status | 0 |

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 08 Sep 2022 15:47:07 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT

Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

testSteps.description: Then Validate that the status code is 200
And Validate that the response contains the key "type" must be "unknown"
And Validate that the response  "message" must be "13"

title: Successful creation of a user in petStore
